OUTRAGEOUS! I went straight to the World Wide Web to research how to reclaim my soul, but I could find no helpful remarks. Finally, a ghoul popped out of the screen and made me drop my new iPhone 6s. This fool of a ghoul claimed he was president, but I was like â€œnoooâ€ derenn j Trump is president. So now I have a lot of confusion. To conclude, only fools would get this app.
